SELECT generalno, kingdomsnm AS kingdoms, belongsnm AS belongs, name, nickname, command, power, brain, politic, story
FROM tk_g_general ge
INNER JOIN tk_m_kingdoms kg ON kg.kingdomsno = ge.kingdomsno
INNER JOIN tk_m_belongs bl ON bl.belongsno = ge.belongsno
WHERE 1 = 1
AND name LIKE '%' || #{searchName } || '%'
AND nickname LIKE '%' || #{searchNickname } || '%'
AND kingdomsnm LIKE '%' || #{searchKingdoms } || '%'
AND belongsnm LIKE '%' || #{searchBelongs } || '%'
ORDER BY ge.generalno ASC

SELECT generalno, kingdomsnm AS kingdoms, belongsnm AS belongs, name, nickname, command, power, brain, politic, story
FROM tk_g_general ge
INNER JOIN tk_m_kingdoms kg ON kg.kingdomsno = ge.kingdomsno
INNER JOIN tk_m_belongs bl ON bl.belongsno = ge.belongsno
WHERE ge.generalno = #{generalno}
